statements.select: SELECT MY_SMALLINT, MY_INTEGER, MY_BIGINT, MY_FLOAT, MY_DECIMAL, MY_VARCHAR, MY_CHAR, MY_BLOB, MY_CLOB, MY_DATE, MY_TIME, MY_TIMESTAMP, MY_BOOL_CHAR, MY_DATE_INT, TIME_UNIT_1, TIME_UNIT_2 FROM MY_TYPES where ID = 2

SELECT ID, MY_SMALLINT, MY_INTEGER, MY_BIGINT, MY_FLOAT, MY_DECIMAL, MY_VARCHAR, MY_CHAR, MY_DATE, MY_TIME, MY_TIMESTAMP, MY_BOOL_CHAR, MY_DATE_INT, TIME_UNIT_1, TIME_UNIT_2 FROM MY_TYPES where ID = :id
